name: punkhouse
description:
punkhouse is a game about the positive good of collective action. move in with your friends to your punkhouse. work together to maintain your house. compete against rival houses in story and arcade challenges where youll have to work together to overcome the rot at the heart of society. meet new friends in town and at protests. 

thanks for stopping by!

A NOTE FROM  THEBONESES: we are going to move away from punkhouse for a few months as we try to produce some smaller projects. we will hopefully return to punkhouse later in 2017.
